document_data.mainbody:
Masanori was a shogun of Wa who ruled around 1717 (1299 DR).
In 1717 (1299 DR), two ninjas infiltrated Aru disguised as pilgrims and tried to assassinate Daimyo Koji Kubahachi. They were killed in the attack, Koji couldnt find who hired them, and in revenge and as a message to his unknown enemy, he executed every one of the pilgrims in the train. At this brutal excess, Masanori removed Koji both from office and from the mortal world.
